fieldPrompt.product_image: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality portrait image (1920x1080 aspect ratio) that represents your product, service, or team member. Include specific details about the subject, setting, lighting, colors, and style. For testimonials, consider showing the person in a professional, confident pose that builds trust and credibility.
fieldPrompt.name: Enter the full name of the person giving the testimonial (e.g., Sarah Johnson, Mike Chen, Dr. Lisa Wang). Use proper capitalization and keep it under 15 characters total.
fieldPrompt.greeting: Write an engaging introduction phrase (under 20 characters) that introduces the person or sets the context. Examples: Meet our team, Our expert says, Customer success, Team spotlight. Make it welcoming and professional.
fieldPrompt.designation: Write the testimonial quote or professional title (under 500 characters). This could be a customer testimonial, employee quote, or professional designation. Use quotation marks if it's a direct quote. Focus on credibility and authenticity.
fieldPrompt.social_handle: Enter the social media handle (under 50 characters) with appropriate prefix (e.g., @companyname, @username, linkedin.com/in/username). This helps build social proof and credibility.
